00021 SMT_CC_Dubins_Path::SMT_CC_Dubins_Path (SMT_Configuration _start, 
00022                                         SMT_Configuration _end,
00023                                         cc_dubins_path_type _type, 
00024                                         double _kappa, double _sigma,
00025                                         SMT_Configuration *_qi1, 
00026                                         SMT_Configuration *_qi2,

00028                                         SMT_CC_Circle *_cend, 
00029                                         SMT_CC_Circle *_ci1, 
00030                                         double _length, double _time)

00032   start = _start; end = _end; type = _type; kappa = _kappa; sigma = _sigma;
00033   qi1 = _qi1; qi2 = _qi2; 
00034   cstart = _cstart; cend = _cend; ci1 = _ci1; ci2 = 0;
00035 }

00043 // affichage alphanumerique des attributs
00044 void SMT_CC_Dubins_Path::print (bool eol) {
00045   cout << "* CC_Dubins_Path: ";
00046   start.print (false); cout << " -> "; 
00047   if ( !null (qi1) ) { qi1->print (false); cout << " -> "; }
00048   if ( !null (qi2) ) { qi2->print (false); cout << " -> "; }
00049   end.print (false); cout << ", type ";
00050   switch (type ) { 
00051   case LSL: cout << "LSL"; break;
00052   case LSR: cout << "LSR"; break;
00053   case RSL: cout << "RSL"; break;
00054   case RSR: cout << "RSR"; break;
00055   case LR1L: cout << "LR1L"; break;
00056   case LR2L: cout << "LR2L"; break;
00057   case RL1R: cout << "RL1R"; break; 
00058   case RL2R: cout << "RL2R"; break;
00059   case S: cout << "S"; break;
00060   case L: cout << "L"; break;
00061   case R: cout << "R"; break;
00062   case LS: cout << "LS"; break;
00063   case SL: cout << "SL"; break;
00064   case SR: cout << "SR"; break;
00065   case RS: cout << "RS"; break;
00066   case EMPTY: cout << "EMPTY"; break;
00067   default: cout << "?"; break;}
00068   cout << ", length " << length << ", time " << time; 
00069   // eventuel saut de ligne final
00070   if ( eol ) { cout << endl; }
00071 }

00188 // ###########################################################################
00189 // class SMT_CC_Circle
00190 // ###########################################################################
00191 
00192 // constructeur(s)
00193 SMT_CC_Circle::SMT_CC_Circle (SMT_Configuration _start,
00194                               bool _left, bool _forward,
00195                               double _kappa, double _sigma) {
00196   start = _start; start.kappa = 0;
00197   left = _left; forward = _forward;
00198   if ( left ) { kappa = fabs (_kappa); sigma = fabs (_sigma); } 
00199   else { kappa = - fabs (_kappa); sigma = - fabs (_sigma); } 
00200   // configuration intermediaire atteinte par le 1er arc de clotoide
00201   double x_i, y_i, theta_i, kappa_i;
00202   end_of_clothoid (start.x, start.y, start.theta, 0,
00203                    sigma, forward, fabs (kappa / sigma), 
00204                    &x_i, &y_i, &theta_i, &kappa_i);
00205   first = SMT_Configuration (x_i, y_i, theta_i, kappa_i);
00206   // centre du cc-circle, rayon
00207   xc = x_i - sin (theta_i) / kappa;
00208   yc = y_i + cos (theta_i) / kappa;
00209   radius  = point_distance (xc, yc, start.x, start.y);
00210   // ecart angulaire entre l'orientation de start et la tangente au
00211   // cc-circle en start
00212   // vecteur d'orientation _start.theta ()
00213   double u_x = cos (start.theta); double u_y = sin (start.theta);
00214   double u_norm = sqrt (pow (u_x, 2) + pow (u_y, 2));
00215   // vecteur normal au rayon
00216   double v_x; double v_y; 
00217   if ( left )
00218     { v_x = yc - start.y; v_y = -xc + start.x; }
00219   else 
00220     { v_x = - yc + start.y; v_y = xc - start.x; }
00221   double v_norm = sqrt (pow (v_x, 2) + pow (v_y, 2));
00222   // produit scalaire -> cos (angle) -> angle
00223   double dot_product = (u_x * v_x + u_y * v_y) / (u_norm * v_norm);
00224   mu = acos (dot_product);  
00225 }
00226 
00227 // construction d'un cc-circle "libre", i.e. sans start ni first
00228 SMT_CC_Circle::SMT_CC_Circle (double _xc, double _yc, double _radius,
00229                               bool _left, bool _forward,
00230                               double _kappa, double _sigma, double _mu) {
00231   start = SMT_Configuration (0, 0, 0, 0);
00232   left = _left; forward = _forward;
00233   if ( left ) { kappa = fabs (_kappa); sigma = fabs (_sigma); } 
00234   else { kappa = - fabs (_kappa); sigma = - fabs (_sigma); } 
00235   first = SMT_Configuration (0, 0, 0, 0);
00236   xc = _xc; yc = _yc; radius = _radius; mu = _mu;
00237 }
00238 
00239 // affichage alphanumerique des attributs
00240 void SMT_CC_Circle::print (bool eol) {
00241   cout << "CC_Circle: ";
00242   start.print (false); 
00243   cout << ", kappa: " << kappa << ", sigma: " << sigma;
00244   if ( left ) { cout << ", left"; } else { cout << ", right"; } 
00245   if ( forward ) { cout << ", forward, "; } else { cout << ", backward, "; } 
00246   first.print (false); 
00247   cout << ", centre: (" << xc << ", " << yc << "), radius " << radius 
00248        << ", mu: " << degrees (mu); 
00249   if ( eol ) { cout << endl; }
00250 }
00251 
00252 // existence d'une mu-tangente externe entre deux cc-circles
00253 bool external_mu_tangent_exists (SMT_CC_Circle c1, SMT_CC_Circle c2) {
00254   // les deux cc-circles ont-ils les meme rayons et angles tangents ?
00255   if ( fabs (c1.radius - c2.radius) > get_epsilon () ) { return false; }
00256   if ( fabs (c1.mu - c2.mu) > get_epsilon () ) { return false; }
00257   // les deux cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00258   if ( c1.left != c2.left ) { return false; }
00259   if ( c1.forward == c2.forward ) { return false; }
00260   // les deux centres sont-ils suffisamment eloignes ?
00261   double distance = point_distance (c1.xc, c1.yc, c2.xc, c2.yc);
00262   return ( distance >= 2 * c1.radius * sin (c1.mu)); 
00263 }
00264 
00265 // calcul de la mu-tangente externe du cc-circle c1 au cc-circle c2
00266 // (conditions d'existence de la mu-tangente externe supposees etre vraies)
00267 void external_mu_tangent (SMT_CC_Circle c1, SMT_CC_Circle c2,
00268                           SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00269   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00270   double theta = atan2 (c2.yc - c1.yc, c2.xc - c1.xc);
00271   // parametres de position des config. tangentes dans le repere local au
00272   // centre de c1
00273   double delta_x = fabs (c1.radius * sin (c1.mu));
00274   double delta_y = fabs (c1.radius * cos (c1.mu));
00275   //
00276   double x, y;
00277   if ( c1.left && c1.forward )
00278     {
00279       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00280       *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00281       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00282       *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00283     }
00284   if ( !c1.left && c1.forward )
00285     {
00286       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00287       *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00288       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00289       *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00290     }
00291 }
00292 
00293 // existence d'une mu-tangente interne entre deux cc-circles
00294 bool internal_mu_tangent_exists (SMT_CC_Circle c1, SMT_CC_Circle c2) {
00295   // les deux cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00296   if ( c1.left == c2.left ) { return false; }
00297   if ( c1.forward == c2.forward ) { return false; }
00298   // les deux centres sont-ils suffisamment eloignes ?
00299   double distance = point_distance (c1.xc, c1.yc, c2.xc, c2.yc);
00300   return ( distance >= 2 * c1.radius); 
00301 }
00302 
00303 // calcul de la mu-tangente interne du cc-circle c1 au cc-circle c2
00304 // (conditions d'existence de la mu-tangente interne supposees etre vraies)
00305 void internal_mu_tangent (SMT_CC_Circle c1, SMT_CC_Circle c2,
00306                           SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2) {
00307   // distance des centres
00308   double distance = point_distance (c1.xc, c1.yc, c2.xc, c2.yc);
00309   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00310   double theta = atan2 (c2.yc - c1.yc, c2.xc - c1.xc);
00311   // angle entre la droite des centres et la direction de la mu-tangente
00312   double alpha = fabs (asin (2 * c1.radius * cos (c1.mu) / distance));
00313   // parametres de position des config. tangentes dans le repere local au
00314   // centre de c1
00315   double delta_x = fabs (c1.radius * sin (c1.mu));
00316   double delta_y = fabs (c1.radius * cos (c1.mu));
00317   //
00318   double x, y;
00319   if ( c1.left && c1.forward )
00320     {
00321       theta = theta + alpha;
00322       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00323       *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00324       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00325       *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00326     }
00327   if ( !c1.left && c1.forward )
00328     {
00329       theta = theta - alpha;
00330       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00331       *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00332       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00333       *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta, 0);
00334     }
00335 }
00336 
00337 // existence d'un cc-circle tangent entre deux cc-circles
00338 bool tangent_circle_exists (SMT_CC_Circle c1, SMT_CC_Circle c2) {
00339   // les deux cc-circles sont-ils compatibles ?
00340   if ( c1.left != c2.left ) { return false; }
00341   if ( c1.forward == c2.forward ) { return false; }
00342   // les deux centres sont-ils suffisamment proches ?
00343   double distance = point_distance (c1.xc, c1.yc, c2.xc, c2.yc);
00344   return ( distance <= 4 * c1.radius); 
00345 }
00346 
00347 // calcul des cc-circles tangents entre deux cc-circles
00348 // (conditions d'existence des cc-circles tangents supposees etre vraies)
00349 void tangent_circle (SMT_CC_Circle c1, SMT_CC_Circle c2,
00350                      SMT_Configuration **q1, SMT_Configuration **q2,
00351                      SMT_Configuration **q3, SMT_Configuration **q4) {
00352   // distance des centres
00353   double distance = point_distance (c1.xc, c1.yc, c2.xc, c2.yc);
00354   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c1 au centre de c2
00355   double theta = atan2 (c2.yc - c1.yc, c2.xc - c1.xc);
00356   // distance du centre du cc-circle a la droite des centres
00357   double h = sqrt (fabs (pow (2 * c1.radius, 2) - pow (0.5 * distance, 2)));
00358   // angle entre la droite des centres et le rayon au centre du cc-circle
00359   double alpha = fabs (atan (2 * h / distance));
00360   // parametres de position des config. tangentes dans le repere local au
00361   // centre de c1
00362   double delta_x = fabs (c1.radius * cos (alpha));
00363   double delta_y = fabs (c1.radius * sin (alpha));
00364   //
00365   double x, y;
00366   if ( c1.left && c1.forward )
00367     {
00368 //        cout << "left-forward: " << distance << ", " << degrees (theta)
00369 //         << ", " << h << ", " << degrees (alpha) << ", " << delta_x 
00370 //         << ", " << delta_y << endl;
00371       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00372       *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + alpha + Half_Pi - c1.mu, 0);
00373       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00374       *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta - alpha + 1.5 * Pi + c1.mu, 0);
00375       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00376       *q3 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta - alpha + Half_Pi - c1.mu, 0);
00377       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00378       *q4 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + alpha + 1.5 * Pi + c1.mu, 0);
00379     }
00380   if ( c1.left && !c1.forward )
00381     {
00382       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00383       *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta - alpha + Half_Pi + c1.mu, 0);
00384       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00385       *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + alpha + 1.5 * Pi - c1.mu, 0);
00386       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00387       *q3 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + alpha + Half_Pi + c1.mu, 0);
00388       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00389       *q4 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta - alpha + 1.5 * Pi - c1.mu, 0);
00390     } 
00391   if ( !c1.left && c1.forward )
00392     {
00393       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00394       *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta - alpha - Half_Pi + c1.mu, 0);
00395       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00396       *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + alpha + Half_Pi - c1.mu, 0);
00397       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00398       *q3 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + alpha - Half_Pi + c1.mu, 0);
00399       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00400       *q4 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta - alpha + Half_Pi - c1.mu, 0);
00401     }
00402   if ( !c1.left && !c1.forward )
00403     {
00404       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00405       *q1 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + alpha - Half_Pi - c1.mu, 0);
00406       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, delta_y, &x, &y);
00407       *q2 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta - alpha + Half_Pi + c1.mu, 0);
00408       global_frame_change (c1.xc, c1.yc, theta, delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00409       *q3 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta - alpha - Half_Pi - c1.mu, 0);
00410       global_frame_change (c2.xc, c2.yc, theta, -delta_x, -delta_y, &x, &y);
00411       *q4 = new SMT_Configuration (x, y, theta + alpha - Half_Pi + c1.mu, 0);
00412     }
00413 }

00416 // ###########################################################################
00417 // class SMT_CC_Turn
00418 // ###########################################################################
00419 
00420 // calcul de la longueur du cc-turn defini par le cc-circle c et la
00421 // configuration d'arrivee q (supposee appartenir au cc-circle et avoir une
00422 // orientation correcte).  le booleen cusps indique si l'on se trouve dans
00423 // le cas avec ou sans manoeuvres (i.e. reeds-shepp vs. dubins)
00424 double cc_turn_length (SMT_CC_Circle *c, SMT_Configuration *q, bool cusps) {
00425   double deflection_min = twopify (pow (c->kappa, 2) / fabs (c->sigma));
00426   // calcul de la deflection
00427   double deflection;
00428   double alpha_c = c->start.theta;
00429   double alpha_q = q->theta;
00430   if ( c->left && c->forward ) { deflection = twopify (alpha_q - alpha_c); }
00431   if ( c->left && !c->forward ) { deflection = twopify (alpha_c - alpha_q); }
00432   if ( !c->left && c->forward ) { deflection = twopify (alpha_c - alpha_q); }
00433   if ( !c->left && !c->forward ) { deflection = twopify (alpha_q - alpha_c); }
00434 
00435   // deflection nulle -> cc-turn = segment
00436   if ( fabs (deflection) < get_epsilon () ) { 
00437     return fabs (2 * c->radius * sin (c->mu)); }
00438 
00439   // cc-turn irregulier
00440   if ( deflection < deflection_min ) {
00441     double d1 = D1 (deflection / 2);
00442     double d2 = point_distance (c->start.x, c->start.y, 
00443                                 q->x, q->y);
00444     double sharpness = 4 * Pi * pow (d1, 2) / pow (d2, 2);
00445     return 2 * sqrt (deflection / sharpness);
00446   }
00447 
00448   // cc-turn regulier (cas sans manoeuvres)
00449   double length_min = fabs (2 * c->kappa / c->sigma);
00450   switch ( cusps ) {            // cc-turn regulier
00451   case true:                    // cas avec manoeuvres
00452     if ( deflection < deflection_min + Pi ) 
00453       { return length_min + fabs ((deflection - deflection_min) / c->kappa); }
00454     else
00455       { return length_min + 
00456           fabs ((Two_Pi - deflection + deflection_min) / c->kappa); }    
00457     break;
00458   default:                      // cas sans manoeuvres
00459     return length_min + fabs ((deflection - deflection_min) / c->kappa);
00460     break; }
00461 }
00462 
00463 // calcul de la longueur du cc-turn de reeds et shepp defini par le
00464 // cc-circle c et la configuration d'arrivee q (supposee appartenir au
00465 // cc-circle et avoir une orientation correcte)
00466 double rs_turn_length (SMT_CC_Circle *c, SMT_Configuration *q) {
00467   return cc_turn_length (c, q, true);
00468 }
00469 
00470 // calcul de la longueur du cc-turn de dubins defini par le cc-circle c et
00471 // la configuration d'arrivee q (supposee appartenir au cc-circle et avoir
00472 // une orientation correcte)
00473 double dubins_turn_length (SMT_CC_Circle *c, SMT_Configuration *q) {
00474   return cc_turn_length (c, q, false);
00475 }
00476 
00477 // calcul pour le cc-circle c de la configuration atteinte par un cc-turn
00478 // d'une certaine deflection comprise entre 0 et 2*pi
00479 void deflection_to_configuration (SMT_CC_Circle c, double deflection,
00480                                   SMT_Configuration *q) {
00481   double x, y, theta, x_g, y_g, theta_g;
00482   // on se place a la configuration origine, on tourne a gauche et en avant 
00483   x = c.radius * (sin (deflection + c.mu) + sin (c.mu));
00484   y = c.radius * (cos (-c.mu) - cos (deflection + c.mu));
00485   theta  = deflection;
00486   // on tient compte de la veritable nature du virage (gauche / droite,
00487   // marche avant / arriere)
00488   if ( c.left && !c.forward ) { x = -x; theta = -theta; }
00489   if ( !c.left && c.forward ) { y = -y; theta = -theta; }
00490   if ( !c.left && !c.forward ) { x = -x; y = -y; }
00491   // on tient compte de la position reelle de le configuration de depart
00492   global_frame_change (c.start.x, c.start.y, 
00493                        c.start.theta, 
00494                        x, y, &x_g, &y_g);
00495   theta_g = theta + c.start.theta;
00496   // retour du resultat
00497   q->x = x_g;
00498   q->y = y_g;
00499   q->theta = twopify (theta_g);
00500   q->kappa = 0;
00501 }
00502 
00503 // appartenance d'une configuration a un cc-circle
00504 bool configuration_on_cc_circle (SMT_CC_Circle c, 
00505                                  SMT_Configuration q) {
00506   // distance du centre de c a q
00507   double distance = point_distance (c.xc, c.yc, q.x, q.y);
00508   //
00509   if ( fabs (distance - c.radius) > get_epsilon () ) { return false; }
00510   // angle de la droite orientee joignant le centre de c a q
00511   double angle = atan2 (q.y - c.yc, q.x - c.xc);
00512   // amgle de la direction de la mu-tangente
00513   if ( c.left && c.forward ) { angle = angle + Half_Pi - c.mu; }
00514   if ( c.left && !c.forward ) { angle = angle + Half_Pi + c.mu; }
00515   if ( !c.left && c.forward ) { angle = angle - Half_Pi + c.mu; }
00516   if ( !c.left && !c.forward ) { angle = angle - Half_Pi - c.mu; }
00517   angle = twopify (angle);
00518   //
00519   return fabs (q.theta - angle) < get_epsilon ();
00520 }

00526 // constructeur
00527 SMT_SC_Path::SMT_SC_Path (SMT_Configuration _start,
00528                           double _sharpness, bool _forward, double _length)
00529   : SMT_Path (_length, 0) {
00530   start = _start; sharpness = _sharpness; forward = _forward; }
00531 
00532 // affichage alphanumerique des attributs
00533 void SMT_SC_Path::print (bool eol) {
00534   cout << "* SC_Path: ";
00535   if ( forward ) cout << "forward"; else cout << "backward"; cout << " from ";
00536   start.print (false); 
00537   cout << ", sharpness " << sharpness;
00538   cout << ", length " << length;
00539   // eventuel saut de ligne final
00540   if ( eol ) { cout << endl; }
00541 }

00544 // ############################################################################
00545 // Class SMT_CC_TP_Path
00546 // ############################################################################
00547 // constructeur
00548 SMT_CC_TP_Path::SMT_CC_TP_Path (SMT_Configuration _start, 
00549                                 SMT_Configuration _end,
00550                                 double _kappa, double _sigma,
00551                                 SMT_Configuration *_qi1, 
00552                                 SMT_Configuration *_qi2,
00553                                 SMT_SC_Path *_sci1, 
00554                                 SMT_SC_Path *_sci2,
00555                                 bool forward, double _length, double _time) 
00556   : SMT_Path (_length, _time) {
00557   start = _start; end = _end; kappa = _kappa; sigma = _sigma;
00558   qi1 = _qi1; qi2 = _qi2; sci1 = _sci1; sci2 = _sci2; }
00559 
00560 // destructeur
00561 SMT_CC_TP_Path::~SMT_CC_TP_Path () {
00562   delete qi1; delete qi2; delete sci1; delete sci2; }
00563 
00564 // affichage alphanumerique des attributs
00565 void SMT_CC_TP_Path::print (bool eol) {
00566   cout << "* CC_TP_Path: ";
00567   start.print (false); cout << " -> "; 
00568   if ( !null (qi1) ) { qi1->print (false); cout << " -> "; }
00569   if ( !null (qi2) ) { qi2->print (false); cout << " -> "; }
00570   end.print (false); 
00571   cout << ", length " << length << ", time " << time; 
00572   if ( !null (sci1) ) sci1->print (false);
00573   if ( !null (sci2) ) sci2->print (false);
00574   // eventuel saut de ligne final
00575   if ( eol ) { cout << endl; }
00576 }
